short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for specialized corporate support and associated services for the continued improvement, sustainment, and application of the plant maintenance and materiel management DRMIS modules in the context of aircraft maintenance.
description: The Defence Resource Management Information System (DRMIS) is the Department of National Defence's enterprise resource planning (ERP) solution for the entire Canadian Armed Forces (CAF).
